segments.text: Which pair of jeans do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really like the straight legs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But they aren't very fashionable . What about these ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like the way they sag down . I feel like I have plumber butt in them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the style ! You just wear boxers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What if someone got it in their head to give them a tug ? What then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're so old fashioned ! Nobody is going to pull down your pants !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you ask me , it's a walking invitation !
segments.speaker: S2
